messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 3324
messages.msgSnippet: on 4/17/03 2:50 PM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at ... Yup. Though right now the work thing is about 90% him, 10% me. For ten years, we ran a theater
messages.messageBody:
on 4/17/03 2:50 PM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com wrote:

> << My husband has a career in music and we are planning on sharing the
> responsibilities of unschooling. Do any other couples both work part time or
> share responsibilities like this. >>

Yup. Though right now the work thing is about 90% him, 10% me. For ten
years, we ran a theater company together where I did most of the
administrative work and we did much of the artistic work together (but
traded off performing).

We are both theater people, but we have to do other things too. Dh is a solo
variety performer, that's most of our $$. We both teach theater here and
there, I write grants and he does a part-time thing at a law firm.

No two days alike in our household!
Wouldn't have it any other way.

Paula
